title: ISic020496. ISic020496
body:
Facsimile Images

[...]Ο [Ἰ]λάρχ[ο̄] ἐφ[...]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2) ; Arena suggests integrating ἐφ[...] as ἔθε̄κε

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Lejeune (1980, 1315) interpreted this inscription as Sikan. The name ῎Ιλαρχος suggested by the integration of Arena is also attested in Sparta (LGPN V3A: 10206) in c. 420 BC and in Chalkis (LGPN V1: 73992) in the Hellenistic period.

bibliography

    Arena 2002 50, pl. XVIII.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373 Lejeune 1980 1315 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002499 Manni Piraino 1980 1778-1779, no. 5, pl. 1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001765 29.0837 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
